body.p: Many respondents expressed concerns that similar transactions would continue to be treated differently. Because no amendments to the definitions of share‑based payment transactions were proposed, some transactions might not be included within the scope of IFRS 2 because they did not meet those definitions. The Board agreed with respondents that the proposals did not achieve the objective of including all share‑based payment transactions within the scope of IFRS 2 as intended.
